div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 643 Vrankamen-Berg, between Krupa (1169) (mod. Krupanj ?) and Otoka, Bosnia, Yugoslavia, 1887 Burial: c. 89 B.C. (Willers) Contents: 135 AE. Pot hoard with bar frag. Emporiae: 1 Syracuse, Hieron II: 1 Carthage: 94 Numidia: 36 Ptolemy I: 1 Ptolemy III: 1 Cleopatra I: 1 (as regent for Ptolemy VI) Aes rude Aes grave As Triens Sextans Disposition: Sarajevo Truhelka, Bosnische Mitt. 1893, pp. 184-8 Bahrfeldt, Mazin, pp. 1-2 Willers, NZ 1904, pp. 6-7, note 1 Haeberlin, Aes Grave (Frankfurt, 1910), p. 16
